 */export var APPEND_PAGE='APPEND_PAGE';export var UPDATE_PRODUCT_LIST_ITEMS='UPDATE_PRODUCT_LIST_ITEMS';export var UPDATE_LOAD_STATUS='UPDATE_LOAD_STATUS';export var UPDATE_PAGE_LOAD_STATUS='UPDATE_PAGE_LOAD_STATUS';/**
 * Append page to the list.
 * @param {Array<Object>} items List of products returned from fetch
 * @param {Number} minPrice Minimal products price returned from fetch
 * @param {Number} maxPrice Maximal products price returned from fetch
 * @param {Number} currentPage Number of requested page
 * @namespace Store/ProductList/Action/appendPage
 */export var appendPage=middleware(function(items,currentPage){return{type:APPEND_PAGE,items:items,currentPage:currentPage};},"Store/ProductList/Action/appendPage\n");/**
 * Update product list with new list (rewrite if already exists).
 * @param {Array<Object>} items List of products returned from fetch
 * @param {Number} currentPage Number of requested page
 * @param {Number} total_count Number of requested page
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/ProductList/Action/updateProductListItems
 */export var updateProductListItems=middleware(function(items,currentPage,total_count,total_pages,args){return{type:UPDATE_PRODUCT_LIST_ITEMS,items:items,currentPage:currentPage,total_pages:total_pages,total_count:total_count,args:args};},"Store/ProductList/Action/updateProductListItems\n");/**
 * Update loading status
 * @param {Boolean} status Loading indication boolean
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/ProductList/Action/updateLoadStatus
 */export var updateLoadStatus=middleware(function(status){return{type:UPDATE_LOAD_STATUS,isLoading:status};},"Store/ProductList/Action/updateLoadStatus\n");/** @namespace Store/ProductList/Action/updatePageLoadingStatus */export var updatePageLoadingStatus=middleware(function(){return{type:UPDATE_PAGE_LOAD_STATUS};},"Store/ProductList/Action/updatePageLoadingStatus");
